sections.MISSION: Killer Troop 3/2CR conducts M4/M249 weapons familiarization for SMâ€™s Spouses and families NLT 13DEC2024, at GTA Range 114, IOT enhance unit cohesion and morale amongst Soldiers and families.
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
Range 114 can support 4 lanes safely. Spouses will be guided to their lane by their safety. If the SM is in proper PPE, they may accompany their spouse to the firing line, aligned behind the shooter and not interfering. Shooters will be allotted 60 rounds of 5.56mm to shoot and X rounds of 5.56mm linked.
Issues and Concerns:
Any shooter must be a DOD ID card holder, registered in DEERS, and 18 years or older.
Shooters must always wear proper PPE, listed below.
Soldiers are responsible for providing their spouses: Eye pro, ear pro, and gloves.
Service and Support
Uniform: OCPs, helmet, kit, eye pro, ear pro, gloves, Equipment: Individual weapon system
sections.END STATE:
All spouses and service members conduct the range in a safe and enjoyable manor. Leading to increased unit cohesion and moral.
